question: Siáng-chêng siá ê gián-kiù bûn-chiong lāi-té, ná-ê LLM model hē-lia̍t (chhù-chhiūⁿ, GPT, Llama) chhut-hiān ê pōe-sò͘ siōng-kài chē?
Ū lī-ūi OpenAI khai-huat ê model (ChatGPT, GPT-3, GPT-4 kap in-ê pian-hêng) ê gián-kiù-mn̂g-chiuⁿ, chóng-kiōng ū kúi phiⁿ?
Tī chia ê hong-sek tiong, iōng FinBERT ê, in chú-iàu ê iōng-tô͘ sī siáⁿ?
Chhōe chhut teh bián-chháiⁿ tông-chi̍t-ê model hē-lia̍t ê nn̄g-ê bô-kâng tāi-sè (chhiūⁿ-kóng, GPT-3 kap GPT-4) lâi piáu-hiān model soán-te̍k siōng-ê sî-kan iân-piàn ê gián-kiù hong-hoat.
Chhiáⁿ lia̍t-chhut 'Method/Paper' ēng Llama ka-cho̍k ê model, m̄-koh bô ēng S&P 500 ê chu-liāu ê.
S&P 500 tī só͘-ū lie̍k-chhut ê gián-kiù tang-tiong, ū 50% ū提--tio̍h. Chit-ê kài-tōa ê sú-iōng pín-lu̍t, tùi kim-iông LLM gián-kiù lâi-kóng, i-ê kak-sek sī án-chóaⁿ?
answer: S&P 500 siông-siông hông sú-iōng, chhut-hiān tī chi̍t-puànn ê gián-kiù lāi-té, í-keng piáu-bêng i sī chi̍t-ê hông jīn-tēng ê piau-chún pē-suá-tiāu, iōng lâi tùi-hū kàm-tēng hām pí-kàu bô-kâng ê model hām hong-sek tī kim-iông gián-kiù lāi-té, pau-koah kó͘-phiò ê ūn-chok ê gān-chhek hām choan-gia̍p ê soán-te̍k. In-ūi i ū chit-ê te̍k-sèng: siōng-chai, kong-khai, chin chē, koh-ū chheng-liu̍t ê chu-liāu-chi̍p. Che hō͘ i piàn-chò sī hōe-chi-suàⁿ lâi-kóng, tùi gān-chhek kó͘-phiò hām choan-gia̍p ê soán-te̍k lūi ê khang-khòe, the̍h-khí khì kàm-tēng hām pí-kàu bô-kâng ê model hām hong-sek ê hāu-èng. Che i-lāi tùi i-ê jīn-tēng, piáu-bêng gián-kiù-chiá su-iàu teh tī chē-lâng kāng-ì ê piau-chún tang-tiong lâi-kóng, hián-sī in model ê hāu-èng, chiah-āu-lâi chài iōng teh koh-khah te̍k-sû, ia̍h-sī choan-iú ê chu-liāu.

question: 如果一个新限制要求所有研究使用多模态数据（例如新闻和市场数据），基于所描述的数据，哪种方法将不再符合要求？
按照這个表格，‘Application’（應用）的複雜程度kap ‘LLM Models’（LLM 模型）的多樣性之間有啥关系？比如说，较闊的應用會用着较多樣的模型嗎？
answer: 這个資料顯示一个倒反的关系。較複雜kap 較特定的應用，比如‘Stock price movement prediction’（股價動態預測）kap ‘Financial analysis’（財務分析）傾向使用多樣的模型，包括幾个世代kap 几个系列的模型（比如說，‘GPT-3, GPT-4, LLaMA-2, LLaMA-3’）。相對來講，着重於看似单一的應用，比如‘Investment portfolio selection’（投資組合挑選）kap ‘Stock market trend’（股市趨勢），显示使用像ChatGPT這类單一的模型。這表示處理複雜的財務任務可能會受益於用几个先進的LLM来进行组合或者比較。

question: Nā-ê siōng-téng, 'LLM Model' ia̍h 'Data' chit-ê siang-á, ū pâi-lia̍t siōng chē bô kāng ê sū-mi̍h ê sè-pó͘?
Sui tsit teh teh gián-kiù-tê, siâng tiàm iōng-tô͘ hong-bīn, teh chú-iàu kóng-tio̍h khoah-khuat ê thé-hē būn-tê, m̄-sī teh tùi te̍k-tēng ê léng-chhek ia̍h-sī tâu-chu jīm-bū?
